title: 60'' Monk's Cloth Natural Fabric By The Yard
features: Sold by the yard continuous up to 30 yards
description: Monks cloth is 60" wide 100% cotton fabric featuring a 4x4 weave/8 count and sold by the yard with a maximum continuous length of 10 yards. Purchasing more than 10 yards will be sold in multiple bolts. Great for curtains as well as Swedish/huck weaving crafts. Works great as an Afghan throw because of it's soft yet heavy duty weight. Pillows, accessories, covers, crafts, decor, and much more. Colors can vary by dye lot and computer screen and are not guaranteed.
